userGuideDialog.title: RS Timer User Guide
userGuideDialog.description: Learn how to make the most of your focus sessions.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started with Pomodoro
gettingStarted.content: The Pomodoro Technique is a time management method that uses a timer to break work into intervals, traditionally 25 minutes in length, separated by short breaks.\n{{appName}} helps you implement this technique. Each work interval is a "Pomodoro." After a set number of Pomodoros (usually 4), you take a longer break.\nBenefits include improved focus, reduced burnout, and better time estimation.

timerControls.title: Timer Controls
timerControls.content:
Use these controls to manage your session:
* Start/Pause: Click the main button to start or pause the current timer (Work, Short Break, or Long Break).
* Skip: Click the skip button (icon with arrow pointing right) to end the current interval and move to the next one.
* Reset: Click the reset button (circular arrow icon) to reset the current interval to its full duration and pause the timer.
* Mute/Unmute: Toggle soundscapes on or off using the volume icon.

customization.title: Customization (Settings)
customization.content:
Click the gear icon in the header to open Settings. You can customize:
* Timer Durations: Set custom lengths for Work, Short Break, and Long Break intervals.
* Long Break Interval: Define how many work sessions occur before a long break.
* Auto-start: Enable/disable automatic starting of breaks and Pomodoros.
* Notifications: Toggle browser notifications for interval ends.
* Soundscapes: Choose different ambient sounds for work/break periods. Adjust master volume. You can also upload your own audio files to use as custom soundscapes.
* Background Animations & Mouse Trail: Select visual background effects and enable/disable a particle effect that follows your mouse.
* Initial Guide: Toggle the helpful guided tour that appears on first visit.

collapsibleCards.title: Collapsible Sections
collapsibleCards.content: The 'Today's Tasks', 'Session Dictionary', and 'Session Notes & Context' sections below the timer are collapsible. Click on their titles to expand or hide them, helping you manage your workspace view.

tasksAndNotes.title: Tasks, Notes & Database
tasksAndNotes.content:
Below the timer, you'll find sections for managing tasks and taking notes:
* Today's Tasks: Add tasks you want to accomplish. These are saved to your Firebase database for the current day.
* Session Notes & Context: Use the textarea to jot down thoughts. Select a 'Session Context' to tailor AI feedback. Notes and context are saved to Firebase for the current day.
* AI Summary: Generated summaries can be appended to your daily notes and saved.

sessionContext.title: Session Context
sessionContext.content: Before analyzing your session data, you can specify a "Session Context" (e.g., Work, Learning, General).\nThis helps the AI provide more tailored feedback and suggestions relevant to your current activity. This context is also stored per day in your Firebase database.

aiAnalysis.title: AI Session Analysis
aiAnalysis.content: {{appName}} features an AI-powered session analyzer. Click the sparkles icon in the header or the "Analyze Data" button in the notes section.\nThe AI will review your completed intervals (if any), tasks, and notes for the current session, along with the selected Session Context.\nIt provides a summary and actionable suggestions for improvement. This summary can be saved to your daily notes, which are stored in Firebase.

chatWidget.title: AI Chat Assistant
chatWidget.content: Need quick help or a productivity tip? Click the chat icon in the bottom right corner to talk to our AI assistant (powered by Gemini).\nIt can answer questions about using {{appName}}, the Pomodoro Technique, or general focus strategies.

dictionaryCard.title: Session Dictionary
dictionaryCard.content: Use the Dictionary Card to get definitions for words in English and Indonesian. These definitions are stored per day in your Firebase database and can be exported to a Markdown file. You can also delete entries from the current day's dictionary.

viewPastNotes.title: Viewing Past Notes
viewPastNotes.content: Within the 'Session Notes & Context' card, you can find a collapsible section to 'View Past Notes'. Use the calendar to select a previous date and view the notes (including any saved AI summaries) from that day, read from your Firebase database. You can also delete the notes for a selected past day.

viewPastData.title: Viewing Past Data
viewPastData.content: Click the calendar icon in the header to navigate to a dedicated page where you can select any past date and view all your recorded tasks, notes, session context, and dictionary entries for that day, all retrieved from your Firebase database.

sessionHistory.title: Session History
sessionHistory.content: Click the history icon (clock with arrow) in the header to view a log of your completed Pomodoro intervals for the current day from your Firebase database.\nThis helps you track your focus sessions.

themeAndAppearance.title: Theme & Appearance
themeAndAppearance.content: * Dark/Light Mode: Toggle between dark and light themes using the sun/moon icon in the header.\n* Background Effects: Choose various animated backgrounds or a simple gradient in the Settings menu to personalize your focus environment.

interactiveTourDialog.welcomeContent: {{appName}} is a Pomodoro timer designed to boost your focus and productivity. This quick tour will show you around.
interactiveTourDialog.timerContent: This is your main countdown timer. It switches between Work, Short Break, and Long Break modes automatically or manually.
interactiveTourDialog.timerControlsContent: Use these buttons to Start/Pause, Skip to the next interval, Reset the current interval, or Mute/Unmute sounds.
interactiveTourDialog.pomodoroDotsContent: These dots track your progress through a Pomodoro cycle. A full cycle (usually 4 work sessions) earns you a Long Break.
interactiveTourDialog.collapsibleCardsContent: The sections for Tasks, Dictionary, and Notes below the timer can be expanded or collapsed by clicking their titles.
interactiveTourDialog.tasksContent: Add your to-dos here for the current session. Mark them complete as you go. Tasks are saved per day to your Firebase database.
interactiveTourDialog.notesContent: Jot down thoughts or distractions here. Select a 'Session Context' (Work, Learning, General) to help the AI give more relevant feedback. Notes and context are saved per day to Firebase.
interactiveTourDialog.aiAnalysisContent: After a session or when you have notes/tasks, click the Sparkles icon (â¨) in the header or 'Analyze Data' button to get an AI summary and improvement tips. You can save this summary to your notes, which get stored in Firebase.
interactiveTourDialog.chatWidgetContent: Click the chat icon in the bottom right to talk to an AI assistant (Gemini) for quick questions or support related to your focus session.
interactiveTourDialog.dictionaryCardContent: Define words in English and Indonesian. Your session's definitions are saved per day to Firebase, can be exported to Markdown, and individual entries can be deleted.
interactiveTourDialog.viewPastNotesContent: In the 'Session Notes & Context' card, expand 'View Past Notes' to pick a date and see notes from that day (from Firebase). You can also delete notes for a viewed past day.
interactiveTourDialog.viewPastDataContent: Click the calendar icon in the header to go to a page where you can view all your saved tasks, notes, context, and dictionary entries for any past date from Firebase.
